title: [Large-scale] Capacity-building Program for Diagnosing Pedagogical Vulnerabilities and Utilizing Concept Mapping

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Instructional Design Concepts and Over 3 Years of Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning design combining online pre-learning and face-to-face workshops, with core objectives of fostering learner self-reflection and organizational change.

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate their own lesson designs from three perspectives using an instructional vulnerability diagnostic tool.
Learners can apply concept mapping techniques to reorganize complex educational theories into visual structures.
Learners can create improvement plans incorporating peer feedback based on self-reflection results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
